Rulings.Tengu:
●If an effect is chained that removes Kunoichi from the field, its new controller still discards 1 card.
●If you give control of your face-up Kunoichi to your opponent while Remove Brainwashing is active, it is immediately returned to your control and when its effect resolves you will discard 1 card.

Rulings.Cat:
● If an effect is chained that removes 'Kunoichi' from the field, its new controller still discards 1 card.
● If you give control of your face-up 'Kunoichi' to your opponent while 'Remove Brainwashing' is applying, it is immediately returned to your control and when its effect resolves you will discard 1 card.

Rulings.Base: 1. If an effect is chained that removes "Kunoichi" from the field, its new controller still discards 1 card.\n2. If you give control of your face-up "Kunoichi" to your opponent while "Remove Brainwashing" is active, it is immediately returned to your control and when its effect resolves you will discard 1 card.
